title: Inquiry on Using the Pipeline for Mouse Somatic Mutation Calling
body:
Dear Luoling,
I am currently in the process of learning about the mouse somatic mutation calling and have come across the pipeline you have provided. I am interested in utilizing this pipeline for my studies and would like to seek your guidance on the following matters:
Pipeline Usage: May I use the pipeline you have provided for my research on mouse somatic mutation calling?
Considerations for Use: Are there any specific considerations or prerequisites I should be aware of when using this pipeline?
Citing the Pipeline: If I decide to use your pipeline, is there a need to cite it in my work? If so, could you please provide the appropriate citation details?
Authorization and Permissions: Do I need to obtain any specific authorization or permissions to use the pipeline? If yes, could you guide me through the process?

I am looking forward to your response.Thank you for your time and assistance.

Best regards,
Wan
